segments.source_content: Hi everyone!

translations.zh-hant: 大家好！

segments.source_content: This week, we welcome **2 new contributors** to help **ensure the continuity of the newsletter** throughout the year, even when Seb takes a break.

translations.zh-hant: 本週我們歡迎 **2 位新貢獻者**加入，協助 **確保全年通訊不間斷**，即使 Seb 休假時也能持續運作。

segments.source_content: **Cyril and Matthieu from [Theodo Apps (formerly BAM)](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** here 👋, filling in to bring you the latest news from the React and React Native worlds.

translations.zh-hant: 我們是 **來自 [Theodo Apps (前身 BAM)](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact) 的 Cyril 和 Matthieu** 👋，將為您帶來 React 和 React Native 領域的最新動態。

segments.source_content: It’s a relatively calm week for React, with some ongoing discussions about the Suspense drama in React 19.

translations.zh-hant: 本週對 React 來說相對平靜，主要圍繞 React 19 中 Suspense 爭議的持續討論。

segments.source_content:
**But React Native? That’s where the real action is!**\
From Expo demoing a way to integrate React DOM components to the exciting launch of React Native WebGPU, there’s plenty to talk about. Plus, we’re diving into new approaches to native module development that are sure to shake things up. And React Native 0.75 is around the corner, we'll cover it next week!

translations.zh-hant:
**但 React Native 才是真正熱鬧的舞台！**\
從 Expo 展示整合 React DOM 元件的方法，到令人興奮的 React Native WebGPU 發布，話題源源不絕。我們還將深入探討顛覆性的原生模組開發新方法。React Native 0.75 即將登場，下週我們將詳細報導！

segments.source_content: Our partner conf **[reactjsday](https://2024.reactjsday.it/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** (🇮🇹 Verona - 25 October) is celebrating its 10th year by upgrading to 2 tracks (16 talks). Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". Great speakers have already been announced: Matheus Albuquerque, Aurora Scharff, Dani Coll, and more!

translations.zh-hant: 我們的合作會議 **[reactjsday](https://2024.reactjsday.it/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)**（🇮🇹 維羅納 - 10月25日）迎來十週年，升級為雙軌議程（16場演講）。輸入代碼 "TWIR" 可享 9 折優惠！已公布重量級講者陣容：Matheus Albuquerque、Aurora Scharff、Dani Coll 等！

segments.source_content: **🎥 [React Native WebGPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)**

translations.zh-hant: **🎥 [React Native WebGPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)**

segments.source_content:
React Native WebGPU has just launched, offering a unified API to leverage the GPU for advanced graphics and computation in React Native! By reusing the Web API standard, we will be able to easily integrate existing WebGPU code samples and libraries, such as ThreeJS, directly into React Native.
Beyond just graphics, React Native WebGPU can be used for tasks like matrix computations, making it interesting for on-device machine learning algorithms. It's built using Nitro Modules for smooth Typescript to C++ interoperability. Currently, it's available in technical preview, signaling exciting developments ahead!

translations.zh-hant:
React Native WebGPU 已正式推出，提供統一 API 來運用 GPU 實現進階圖形與計算功能！透過重用 Web API 標準，我們能輕鬆整合現有 WebGPU 程式碼範例與函式庫（如 ThreeJS）至 React Native。
除了圖形處理，React Native WebGPU 還能用於矩陣運算等任務，使其在裝置端機器學習演算法中極具潛力。該專案採用 Nitro Modules 建構，實現 TypeScript 與 C++ 的無縫互通。目前處於技術預覽階段，預示著令人振奮的發展前景！

segments.source_content: **The Future of React Native Modules**

translations.zh-hant: **React Native 模組的未來**

segments.source_content: Exciting times for React Native developers! Marc Rousavy is shaking things up with NitroModules, a new way to write native code 📦 [that’s blowing away existing solutions in speed tests](https://github.com/mrousavy/NitroBenchmarks). He's encountered some limitations with JSI in VisionCamera. The project is already stable on the C++ side and is already being used in various projects like 🐦 [react-native-unistyles](https://x.com/jpudysz/status/1822541758137303233) and react-native-webgpu, with Swift and Kotlin bindings still in progress.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 開發者的激動時刻！Marc Rousavy 正透過 NitroModules 革新原生程式碼開發方式 📦 [在速度測試中大幅超越現有方案](https://github.com/mrousavy/NitroBenchmarks)。他在 VisionCamera 中發現了 JSI 的某些限制。該專案在 C++ 端已趨穩定，並應用於多個專案如 🐦 [react-native-unistyles](https://x.com/jpudysz/status/1822541758137303233) 和 react-native-webgpu，Swift 與 Kotlin 綁定仍在開發中。

segments.source_content: 👀 [Meanwhile, a new proposal to push the use of Swift for TurboModules has landed.](https://github.com/okwasniewski/discussions-and-proposals/blob/22edd2c7853aaf2ee654b57f4521e43d668103fb/proposals/0000-swift-turbo-modules.md) These changes will ease native modules development by moving away from Objective-C and C++. With these updates, building native modules is about to get a whole lot better!

translations.zh-hant: 👀 [與此同時，一項推動 Swift 用於 TurboModules 的新提案已提出](https://github.com/okwasniewski/discussions-and-proposals/blob/22edd2c7853aaf2ee654b57f4521e43d668103fb/proposals/0000-swift-turbo-modules.md)。這些變更將透過棄用 Objective-C 和 C++ 來簡化原生模組開發。隨著這些更新，建置原生模組將大幅提升效率！
